ACT SAT Prep How to determine if a point lies on a line

\begin{array}{c}\ny=\frac{1}{2} x+3 \\\n(0,0) \\\n(3,0) \\\n(0,3) \\\n(6,4.5) \\\n(6.5,4)\n\end{array}[imath]y=\frac{1}{2} x+3 [/imath] [imath](0,0) [/imath] [imath](3,0) [/imath] [imath](0,3) [/imath] [imath](6,4.5) [/imath] [imath](6.5,4)[/imath]
